title: WTB- PSA graded portraits of Beckley, Bender and Huggins
author: Ct94122

posts.post_title: WTB- PSA graded portraits of Beckley, Bender and Huggins
posts.post_content: I am looking to buy PSA graded 2, 3, or 4 (preferable no qualifiers) of Beckley, Bender, Huggins or Baker (non portrait). Let me know if anyone has one to sell. I have only ever bought on eBay, Auction houses or at National, so let me know how this works, thanks
Good luck on your search, great cards...

Hey Cris,

Welcome to the Net54 community. I know Cris and have had several transactions with him in the past. He’s very fair and has genuine passion for this great tobacco card set. Best of luck with your search Cris!

Thanks to my new friends here at net54, I have collected the Chief bender portrait, Jake Beckley, Miller Huggins portrait, homerun Baker, Fred Tenney,  Bull Durham  Lajoie bat, Murphy Horizantal, Mitchell, Hall, Flanagan, Burke, Merkle throwing, McIntyre, and Hunky Shaw.  

Thanks guys!
